content: did you know about mit moradabad if you have knowlede about them then tell me all things

MIT Moradabad is a private engineering college located in Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. Here are some key points about the institution:

* Full Name: Moradabad Institute of Technology
* Established: 1996
* Affiliated to: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow
* Courses Offered: B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, MCA, and Diploma in various disciplines like Computer Science, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Electronics, and Communication Engineering
* Approvals: Approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and University Grants Commission (UGC)
* Campus: Spread over 13 acres of land, with modern infrastructure, including Wi-Fi enabled campus, state-of-the-art laboratories, and a central library
* Placements: The college has a dedicated training and placement cell, and some of the top recruiters include Amazon, Accenture, IBM, Infosys, and TCS
* Rankings: Ranked among the top private engineering colleges in Uttar Pradesh by various ranking agencies

Please let me know if you need more specific information!
